item.title: The Best Grilling Of Bernanke Came From Senator Elizabeth Warren And Republicans Should Be Ashamed
item.description: I agree with Republican Senator Corker that inflation is a danger in the future. But inflation doesn’t win the hearts and minds of most Americans right now. No one’s worried about it except economists and economics geeks. The death of the community and regional bank, however, does bother people. As does the printing of money that goes straight into the 5 biggest banks in history . . . and stays there.
